text: Johnny Doesn't Live Here Any More is a 1944 American romantic comedy movie directed by Joe May and was based on short stories. It stars Simone Simon, James Ellison, Minna Gombell, Chick Chandler, Robert Mitchum, Dorothy Granger, Janet Shaw and was distributed by Monogram Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1944 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies based on short stories Category:Movies directed by Joe May
title: Johnny Doesn't Live Here Any More
